elements.title: MyEnergi
elements.description: MyEnergi  developing green products for home and business, recently awarded a BEIS contract for domestic DSR [source: the energyst](https://theenergyst.com/domestic-demand-side-response-8-6m-competition-winners-announced/)

elements.title: Home Connect
elements.description: Home Connect  is the iot very proprietary platform by Bosch, device management and optimisation with a set of selected partners

elements.title: Hive
elements.description: Hive  smart home device range, started with thermostat, bought by Centrica / British Gas

elements.title: Nest
elements.description: Nest  notoriously bought by Google, started as thermostat only, progressively expanded to smart home

elements.title: Develco
elements.description: Develco  Denmark based, gateway, controlled socket, relays, pass through, sensors. All Zigbee connected, quite amazing

elements.title: Lightwave rf
elements.description: Lightwave rf  controlled and connected power sockets, switches, sensors, radiator valves. They claim to do energy monitoring, but haven't found anything on website.

elements.title: Netatmo
elements.description: Netatmo  smart thermostat, air quality monitor, smoke detector, radiator valves, indoor / outdoor camera

elements.title: Gridduck
elements.description: Gridduck  UK based cloud energy management platform with devices developed on top of Develco (see above). Listed for winning 360k in funding for gamification of EV charging in the south-korea collaboration, [link](https://www.gov.uk/guidance/funding-for-innovative-smart-energy-systems) founder and CEO is [Gregor](https://www.linkedin.com/in/gregor-hoefter-8bb77/)

elements.title: Asema
elements.description: Asema  is a smart-energy iot platform with sensors and dashboards, not sure it's on the market already. They also have an [open API](http://www.smart-api.io/)

elements.title: Innovelec
elements.description: Innovelec  custom design and implementation of IoT solutions mainly in UK

elements.title: Tridium
elements.description: Tridium  owned by Honeywell International deleoping IoT for business applications, creators of the Niagara framework that also has a [marketplace](https://www.niagaramarketplace.com/marketplace_home)

elements.title: Syscom
elements.description: Syscom  is a Centrica company that creates tailored and custom-made solutions in the engineering, software, commissioning and maintenance of Building Energy Management Systems. Manufacturer of a [wireless meter](https://syscombms.com/wireless-metering/)

elements.title: Control 4
elements.description: Control 4  is one of the leading home automation systems with plenty of upscale different devices. Quite new to energy efficiency though, worth [a check](https://www.control4.com/blog/456/energyefficient-home-controls-lighting-and-solar-with-a-hightech-twist)

elements.title: 75f
elements.description: 75f  is a IoT smart HVAC solution makes commercial buildings more comfortable and energy efficient. Funded by [breakthrough energy ventures](https://www.gatesnotes.com/Energy/Buildings-are-good-for-people-and-bad-for-the-climate)

elements.title: EcoSync Energy
elements.description: EcoSync Energy  have created a cloud-based platform for existing building technologies like the room booking system and heating control to synchronise and communicate so as to provide heating for occupied areas only.

elements.title: Guru Systems
elements.description: Guru Systems  improves the performance of heat networks, their technology is for people who want to deliver and operate heat networks
